description:
Makoto is growing weaker, leading Yuichi to increase the amount of attention he gives her. Her condition grave, Yuichi recalls Mishio’s words - and he also remembers a fuller picture of Makoto’s past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Berceuse of the Baby Fox
子狐の子守歌(ベルスーズ) ~berceuse~
